pullrequest.title: Fix joint visualization axis frame issue

content.raw:
Ahh got it, I guess I don't understand very well how the whole attachment works. I thought it was something like `use_parent_model_frame`, where, I think, the joint is aligned with the parent model at the start, but moves with the child link afterwards.

Nervermind then ;)
content.html:
